Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Hs03 (predicted AMPs, encrypted AMPs, cryptide, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: predicted intragenic antimicrobial peptide, predicted from the human unconventional myosin 1H protein,  Homo sapiens, primates, mammals, animals

Literature.Author: Brand GD, Ramada MHS, Manickchand JR, Correa R, Ribeiro DJS, Santos MA, Vasconcelos AG, Abrão FY, Prates MV, Murad AM, Cardozo Fh JL, Leite JRSA, Magalhães KG, Oliveira AL, Bloch C Jr.2019
Literature.Title: Intragenic antimicrobial peptides (IAPs) from human proteins with potent antimicrobial and anti-inflammatory activity.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (45%) toTemporin-SHa. V=F: 15%. Discovered from the human unconventional myosin 1h protein by computer prediction.Activity: active against S. aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC 32 uM), S. epidermidis (MIC 21 uM), and C. albicans (MIC 32 uM). Inactive: T.rubrum (MIC 256 uM).Toxicity: human RBC: HC50 >128 uM. not hemo.lytic.Structure: it became helical after binding to lipids such as DMPG (88.6%) or DMPC (92.9%).  Updated 8/2019; 7/2021
